text: Het recyclen is belangrijk voor ons milieu, maar het gaat te ver wanneer we het vergeten dat onze economie ook een rol speelt. Recycling is important for the environment, but we go too far when we forget that our economy also plays a role. We should strive for a balance between reducing waste and maintaining a strong economy. Politieke correctheid moet niet ons vrijheid van meningsuiting beperken.    Translation:Recycling is important for the environment, but it goes too far when we forget that our economy also plays a role. We should strive for a balance between reducing waste and maintaining a strong economy. Political correctness must not limit our freedom of speech.    -----------------Note: The use of hashtags ( is common on social media platforms like Reddit to make posts discoverable by other users with similar interests.
